Package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.repositories.joins.project

Interface ProjectSampleJoinRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ProjectSampleJoin,​Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProjectSampleJoin>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProjectSampleJoin,​Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ProjectSampleJoin,​Long>
    public interface ProjectSampleJoinRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ProjectSampleJoin,​Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<ProjectSampleJoin>
    Repository for managing ProjectUserJoin.

List<Join<Project,​Sample>> getProjectForSample​(Sample sample)

        Parameters:
        sample - The Sample to get the projects for
        Returns:

      • getSampleOrganismsForProject

        @Query("select DISTINCT(j.sample.organism) FROM ProjectSampleJoin j where j.project=?1")
List<String> getSampleOrganismsForProject​(Project project)
        Get a list of the organism fields stored for all Samples in a Project
        Parameters:
        project - the Project to get sample organisms for
        Returns:
        a list of sample organisms

      • countSamplesForProject

        @Query("select count(j.id) from ProjectSampleJoin j where j.project = ?1")
Long countSamplesForProject​(Project project)

        Returns:
